title: Alcohol in the human body
creator_credit: Felix Forsman and Fennada Filmi Junior
brief_description: A cartoon showing the impact of alcohol on the nervous system. It portrays sensibly, objectively and lucidly all effects of alcohol in the human body, and the problems these pose in our society. It leaves the viewer to draw his own conclusions.
